video.title: The Bletchley Circle
video.synopsis: Four ordinary women with an extraordinary flair for code breaking and razor-sharp intelligence skills are the focus of this murder-mystery drama.

episodes.synopsis: When former codebreaker Susan Gray spots a hidden pattern in a series of murders, she enlists her wartime friends to try and track down the murderer.
episodes.title: Cracking a Killer's Code: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Susan and her friends close in on the killer of five girls, a shocking discovery tests their theories and forces them to set a dangerous trap.
episodes.title: Cracking a Killer's Code: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Thrown into a confrontation with the murderer they have so brilliantly tracked down, the women become locked into a dangerous game of cat and mouse.
episodes.title: Cracking a Killer's Code: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Former Bletchley Park girl Alice Merren is in prison awaiting trial for the murder of the eminent scientist John Richards.
episodes.title: Blood On Their Hands: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The circle suspects a cover-up involving the death of a scientist and the framing of Alice Merren. Soon, the circle comes under surveillance.
episodes.title: Blood On Their Hands: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Millie is kidnapped by Maltese gangsters who are importing more than just cigarettes and alcohol: They are also trafficking girls from Eastern Europe.
episodes.title: Uncustomed Goods: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The circle believes there must be corruption within the vice squad. Lucy memorizes a businesswoman's ledger, which could hold the key to the operation.
episodes.title: Uncustomed Goods: Part 2
